```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(BasketballAnalyzeR)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
```


```{r}
##2025 MLB Batting stats from Baseball Reference
##scraped the old fashion way export to csv and formated in excel
batting2025 <- read_csv('data/MLBBatting2025.csv')
```


```{r}
##selecting columns to perform correlation analysis
cor_data <- batting2025 %>% 
  ##played in .75 seasons games want consistent players not biased by injury or garbage time
  filter(G >= 120) %>% 
  ##looking at correlation between the following
  ##only need select since not performing any mutations
  ##renaming WAR in select statment so appears in plots
  select(WAR = `WARâ–¼`, HR, RBI, SB, OBP, SO, GIDP, R)
```


```{r}
##corrlation matrix chart
corrmatrix <- corranalysis(cor_data, threshold = 0.5)
plot(corrmatrix)
```
